title: Protons
desc:
Post 1304
- Negative effects in this pile turn positive, host chooses what happens
- If there are three or more cards in this pile, they all are removed and randomly given to players. A random positive card is played here
- This card is shown to other players as a different random <:void:1119855990263775283> card
- You may also play this card when a player uses any effect on you
- You do not have to play this card upon drawing it, you may keep it in your hand
- Other players will see you drawing a card upon playing this card to simulate an actual <:void:1119855990263775283> cardâ€™s rule
